name.value: Immunization - XIS Server - Scenario 1.2 - Serve Immunization resources of 'Antoon van de XXX_Bergge' - target CheckContent - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 1.2 - Serve Immunization resources of 'Antoon van de XXX_Bergge'
OAuth Token for current patient
X-Correlation-ID, by default a UUID following the MedMij Afsprakenstelsel. Does not have to be edited, see https://nictiz.atlassian.net/browse/MM-5132 for more information
Resource.id for Patient 1
Resource.id for Immunization 1
Resource.id for PractitionerRole 1
Resource.id for Location 1

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in
Resource.id for Medication 1
Serve Immunization resource including the patient, performer and location
Test XIS server to serve Immunization resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.

name.value: Scenario 1.2 - Serve Immunization resources - Check Patient

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Patient that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: nl-core-Patient--XXX-Boekwijt)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Patient
Patient resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-Patient'
Contains .identifier with .system and .value

Contains .name with .use 'official', and .text with a value, and .family with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails
Contains .name.use 'official'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .name.text with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

Contains .name.family with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Contains .name.family with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .name.family.extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .birthDate

name.value: Scenario 1.2 - Serve Immunization resources - Check Immunization

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Immunization that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: 151d8316-6b4b-11ec-0000-020000000000)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Immunization with properties: contains .vaccineCode.coding.code = '2925508'
Immunization resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/imm-Vaccination-event'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-imm-Vaccination.PharmaceuticalProduct' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'completed'
Contains .vaccineCode with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and .code '2925508' and .display
Contains .patient with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .occurrenceDateTime
Contains .location with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .site with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AnatomicalLocation.Laterality' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '7771000' and .display and .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '40983000' and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${151d8316-6b4b-11ec-0000-020000000000-id}').site.where(extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AnatomicalLocation.Laterality').value.ofType(CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '7771000' and display) and coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '40983000' and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .site.extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-AnatomicalLocation.Laterality' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '7771000' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-9 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .site with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '40983000' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-9 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .route with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.9' and .code '2' and .display
Contains .doseQuantity with .value '0.5' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'ml'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${151d8316-6b4b-11ec-0000-020000000000-id}').doseQuantity.where(value = 0.5 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'ml').exists()

description.value: Contains .performer with .function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display, and .actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${151d8316-6b4b-11ec-0000-020000000000-id}').performer.where(function.coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and code = 'AP' and display) and actor.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .performer.function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-12 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .performer.actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-12 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .reasonCode with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '404904002' and .display
Contains .reasonCode with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '159741000146107' and .display

Contains .protocolApplied with .targetDisease with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '840539006' and .display, and .doseNumberString with a value. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

Contains .protocolApplied.targetDisease with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '840539006' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-16 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .protocolApplied.doseNumberString with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-16 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

name.value: Scenario 1.2 - Serve Immunization resources - Check PractitionerRole

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR PractitionerRole that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: nl-core-HPrf-PracRol--PrcRol-2165281100731-02020202)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 PractitionerRole with properties: contains .speciality.coding.code = '0100'
PractitionerRole resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-HealthProfessional-PractitionerRole'
Contains .practitioner with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .organization with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .specialty with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.6.7' and .version and .code '0100' and .display

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(PractitionerRole).where(id = '${nl-core-HPrf-PracRol--PrcRol-2165281100731-02020202-id}').specialty.where(coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.6.7' and version and code = '0100' and display)).exists()

name.value: Scenario 1.2 - Serve Immunization resources - Check Location

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Location that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: nl-core-HPrv--2165281100733-10000006)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Location with properties: .name = 'GGD test 06 West'
Location resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-HealthcareProvider'
Contains .name with a value. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

Contains .telecom with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-Comment' with .valueString with a value and .system 'phone' and with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-CodeSpecification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.4.22.1' and .code 'LL' and .display, and .value with a value, and .use 'work'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

description.value: Contains .telecom.extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-Comment' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .telecom.use 'work'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .address with .line with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-streetName' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-houseNumber' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-buildingNumberSuffix' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-additionalLocator' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-unitID' with .valueString with a value, and .city with a value, and .district with a value, and .postalCode with a value, and .country with a value and with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-CodeSpecification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:iso:std:iso:3166' and .version and .code 'NL' and .display. description.value: Contains .address.line with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-streetName' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-houseNumber' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-buildingNumberSuffix' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-additionalLocator' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-ADXP-unitID' with .valueString with a value. Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.

Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.

name.value: Scenario 1.2 - Read Medication resource 1 - Check Medication

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Medication that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: nl-core-PhPrd--ABV3025-21684011138832447-2925508)
Response contains exactly 1 Medication
Medication resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/imm-PharmaceuticalProduct'
Contains .code with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and .code '2925508' and .display and .userSelected 'true' and .text with a value

expression.value: Medication.where(id = '${nl-core-PhPrd--ABV3025-21684011138832447-2925508-id}').code.where(coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and code = '2925508' and display and userSelected = true) and text.hasValue()).exists()

description.value: Contains .form with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.11' and .code '76' and .display
Contains .batch with .lotNumber with a value
